description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "It's Super Smash Strategy!" in a fast-paced Real Time Strategy game featuring chaotic 4-player local multiplayer, a full single player campaign including an insidious AI, and fully customisable characters!  Build your army using the 4 unit types to outmanoeuvre your foes in an RTS designed specifically for console.  Buy the full game to unlock multiplayer action as well as the full campaign!
